member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.CreatedDate
member.summary: Create time for this file (formatted ISO8601 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.Description
member.summary: A short description of the file

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.DownloadUrl
member.summary: Short term download URL for the file. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.FileExtension
member.summary: The file extension used when downloading this file. This field is read only. To set the extension, include it on title when creating the file. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.FileSize
member.summary: The size of the file in bytes. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.Id
member.summary: The id of the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.IndexableText
member.summary: Indexable text attributes for the file (can only be written)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.Kind
member.summary: The type of file. This is always drive#file

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.Labels
member.summary: Labels for the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.LastViewedDate
member.summary: Last time this file was viewed by anyone (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.Md5Checksum
member.summary: An MD5 checksum for the content of this file. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.MimeType
member.summary: The mimetype of the file

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.ModifiedByMeDate
member.summary: Last time this file was modified by the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Last time this file was modified by anyone (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.ParentsCollection
member.summary: Collection of parent folders which contain this file. On insert, setting this field will put the file in all of the provided folders. If no folders are provided, the file will be placed in the default root folder. On update, this field is ignored.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.Title
member.summary: The title of this file.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.IndexableTextData
member.summary: Indexable text attributes for the file (can only be written)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.IndexableTextData.Text
member.summary: The text to be indexed for this file

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.LabelsData
member.summary: Labels for the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.LabelsData.Hidden
member.summary: Whether this file is hidden from the user

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.LabelsData.Starred
member.summary: Whether this file is starred by the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.LabelsData.Trashed
member.summary: Whether this file has been trashed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.ParentsCollectionData.Id
member.summary: The id of this parent

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File.ParentsCollectionData.ParentLink
member.summary: A link to get the metadata for this parent

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.Permission.AdditionalRoles
member.summary: Any additional roles that this permission describes.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.Permission.ETag
member.summary: An etag for this permission.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.Permission.Kind
member.summary: The kind of this permission. This is always drive#permission

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.Permission.Role
member.summary: The role that this permission describes. (For example: reader, writer, owner)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.Permission.Type
member.summary: The type of permission (For example: user, group etc).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.DriveService.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.DriveService.Scopes
member.summary: A list of all OAuth2.0 scopes. Each of these scopes relates to a permission or group of permissions that different methods of this API may need.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.DriveService.Scopes.DriveFile
member.summary: View and manage Google Drive files that you have opened or created with this app

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.FilesResource.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a file's metadata by id.
member.param: Required - The id for the file in question.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.FilesResource.Insert(Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File)
member.summary: Inserts a file, and any settable metadata or blob content sent with the request.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.FilesResource.Patch(Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File,System.String)
member.summary: Updates file metadata and/or content. This method supports patch semantics.
member.param: Required - The id for the file in question.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.FilesResource.Update(Google.Apis.Drive.v1.Data.File,System.String)
member.summary: Updates file metadata and/or content
member.param: Required - The id for the file in question.

member.summary: The id for the file in question.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.FilesResource.PatchRequest.NewRevision
member.summary: Whether a blob upload should create a new revision. If not set or false, the blob data in the current head revision will be replaced.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.FilesResource.PatchRequest.UpdateModifiedDate
member.summary: Controls updating the modified date of the file. If true, the modified date will be updated to the current time, regardless of whether other changes are being made. If false, the modified date will only be updated to the current time if other changes are also being made (changing the title, for example).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v1.FilesResource.PatchRequest.UpdateViewedDate
member.summary: Whether to update the view date after successfully updating the file.
